item.title:
The trailer for the remastered and restored edition of ‘OLDBOY’ has been released.
The film returns to theaters on August 16.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Netflix teases the sixth season of Black Mirror as “the most unpredictable, unclassifiable and unexpected [season] yet.”
Premiering this June.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Anjana Vasan, Paapa Essiedu, Katherine Rose Morley & David Shields star in BLACK MIRROR S6 episode ‘DEMON 79.’
It takes place in northern England in 1979, where a meek sales assistant is told she must commit terrible acts to prevent disaster.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Zazie Beetz, Clara Rugaard & Danny Ramirez star in BLACK MIRROR S6 episode ‘MAZEY DAY.’
It follows a troubled starlet who is dogged by invasive paparazzi while dealing with the consequences of a hit-and-run incident.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Aaron Paul, Josh Hartnett, Kate Mara, Auden Thornton & Rory Culkin star in BLACK MIRROR S6 episode ‘BEYOND THE SEA.’
It takes place in an alternate 1969, where two men on a perilous high-tech mission wrestle with the consequences of an unimaginable tragedy.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Samuel Blenkin, Myha'la Herrold, Daniel Portman, John Hannah & Monica Dolan star in BLACK MIRROR S6 episode ‘LOCH HENRY.’
It follows a couple who travel to a Scottish town to work on a nature documentary but find themselves drawn to a juicy local story involving shocking events.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Annie Murphy, Salma Hayek, Michael Cera, Rob Delaney, Ben Barnes & Himesh Patel star in BLACK MIRROR S6 episode ‘JOAN IS AWFUL.’
The story of an average woman who discovers a streaming platform launched a prestige TV adaptation of her life, where she is portrayed by Salma Hayek.
item.author: FilmUpdates
